sentence.Network_en: The Lodz group was split in twain by the main thrust of the German Tenth Army.
sentence.Network_cn: 在罗兹的兵团,被德国第十集团军的主力截成两段.

auth_sentence.content: Airports in Krakow, Lodz, Katowice, Gdansk and Poznan have had to cancel or postpone departures and arrivals due to the fog.

auth_sentence.content: He was invited to participate in a ceremony in Lodz to commemorate 60 years since the ghetto's liquidation, but turned it down.
